OK, so the Sochi winte Olympics are now open. To celebrate that, a pretty straightforward challenge: creat a Kerbal Bobsleigh!!! (Just the sleigh itself)

Scoring

Create a Bobsleigh - 5 points

Have folding 'push handles' - 2 points

Create a track to go with it - 20 points

Make the Bobsleigh functional and able to use the track - 55 points

Maximum: 82 points!!!

Good Luck!!!

The Kerbal Olympics - Hot, Cool, Explodey!!!

A ripoff of the Sochi Olympics - Hot, Cool, Yours!!! Slogan

Good idea. Some possible tweaks -

1) Some points for fastest time.

2) Various events: 4-man bobsled, 2-man bobsled, toboggan, luge.....something about the notion of running down a winding hill at ninety miles per hour with nothing put a sled strapped to your backside sounds very Kerbal....

Edited February 7, 2014 by capi3101

Looks cool! You inspired me. I'm not going to build a track (as it would be too lagtastic for me), so I'll transport the sled to the nearby mountains, then try it out there. My design may not be similar to the real sleds used on the olympic games... I don't watch bobsled racings, as it's unpopular in our country (I don't know if we ever had a sled team).
